name: FossFLOW
short_description: Create beautiful isometric infrastructure diagrams with auto-save and offline support.
description: Create beautiful isometric infrastructure diagrams with auto-save and offline support. FossFLOW is a self-hosted application focused on productivity, networking, self-hosted, homelab. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host FossFLOW on your home server to create beautiful isometric infrastructure diagrams with auto-save and offline support without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use FossFLOW to manage your productivity workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
